title: [844. Backspace String Compare](https://leetcode.cn/problems/backspace-string-compare/)
content:
| English | 简体中文 |
844. Backspace String Compare Description Given two strings s and t, return true if they are equal when both are typed into empty text editors. '#' means a backspace character.
Note that after backspacing an empty text, the text will continue empty.
 
Example 1:
Input: s = "ab#c", t = "ad#c" Output: true Explanation: Both s and t become "ac". Example 2:
Input: s = "ab##", t = "c#d#" Output: true Explanation: Both s and t become "". Example 3:
Input: s = "a#c", t = "b" Output: false Explanation: s becomes "c" while t becomes "b".  
Constraints:
1 <= s.length, t.length <= 200 s and t only contain lowercase letters and '#' characters.  
Follow up: Can you solve it in O(n) time and O(1) space?
